Room.Name: Trees Above Etolos
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along some planks set up around the trees of Etolos.
Room.LongDescription: High up above the inner circle of the Etolian culture, you find yourself in a predicament. The further inward you get, the more druidian guards come out. Yet curiosity has been cursed upon you. The planks in the trees have been set up by the druids to allow easy travelling between the tall tress in the forest.
